definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: My skin crawled when I heard a sudden shriek in the dead of night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚万籁俱寂时突然听到一声尖叫，吓得我汗毛直竖。

sentences.english: Often the magnetic people are of Asian descent and thus not typically hirsute.
sentences.chinese: 通常磁铁人是亚洲地区的，他们都是典型的少汗毛的。

sentences.english: The hairs on the back of my neck prickled with fear.
sentences.chinese: 脖梗儿的汗毛都竖起来了。

sentences.english: Today, I got fed up with the amount of hair on my feet, so I went to get my foot hair waxed off.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我厌烦了脚上厚厚的汗毛，便去把它用蜡除掉。

sentences.english: Whether the sweat pores, is expected to identify genuine and fake seeds true strokes.
sentences.chinese: 有无汗毛孔，是鉴别真假籽料的真招。

sentences.english: Sweat pores here is a generation term.
sentences.chinese: 汗毛孔在这里是一个代用词。
她有剃腿上汗毛的习惯。

sentences.english: It got a bit spooky when James started telling ghost stories.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯开始讲鬼故事的时候，有点让人汗毛直竖。

sentences.english: The proprietor was a Greek with hairy arms.
sentences.chinese: 这个老板娘是个希腊人，手臂上长满了汗毛。

sentences.english: His ghost story made my flesh creep.
sentences.chinese: 他的鬼怪故事使我汗毛直竖。

sentences.english: The sight of snake makes my flesh creep.
The sight of the snake made her flesh creep.
Gu laid great emphasis on the three hairs, and Pei was very satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 顾恺之却把这三根汗毛画得特别突出，裴楷非常满意。

sentences.english: When I removed my socks, the waxer laughed the amount of foot hair.
sentences.chinese: 我一脱掉短袜，涂蜡师便冲着我脚上的汗毛大笑起来。

sentences.english: The ambulance siren made my skin crawl.
sentences.chinese: 救护车汽笛声让我汗毛直竖。

sentences.english: With the sweat pores to identify genuine and fake seeds expected to be very effective.
sentences.chinese: 用汗毛孔来鉴别真假籽料非常有效。

definition: fine hair on the human body
to have one's hair stand on end (idiom)/to feel one's blood run cold
calf (back of the leg below the knee)
the back of the human body
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
back (of a human or other vertebrate)
to feel a chill (as an emotional response)/to feel cold (as a clinical symptom)
